snippet: Despite efforts by New York City to slow traffic and protect pedestrians, an off-duty police officer was killed when his vehicle ended up sideways against one of the storefronts in the hub of Queens Plaza on Tuesday.
abstract: Ramp from Queensboro Bridge onto fast-developing pedestrian hub is site of third death as car fails to navigate exit; off-duty police officer Elisa Toro is killed, despite efforts by New York City to slow traffic and protect pedestrians at hazardous site following similar crashes in 2011.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and REBECCA WHITE

lead_paragraph: Despite efforts by New York City to slow traffic and protect pedestrians, an off-duty police officer was killed when his vehicle ended up sideways against one of the storefronts in the hub of Queens Plaza on Tuesday.

headline.main: 3rd Death After Another Crash at Hazardous Queensboro Bridge Exit
headline.print_headline: 3rd Death After Another Crash at Hazardous Queensboro Bridge Exit
